thoughts.text: I have obtained the information I need about the Brno Reservoir Trail. I will use the execute_shell command to create a new directory for my trip and write the information I obtained to a file within that directory.
thoughts.reasoning: Creating a new directory and writing the information I obtained to a file will allow me to easily access the information I need about the trail. This will help me plan my route and ensure that I am adequately prepared for my adventure.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the execute_shell command to create a new directory for my trip
- Use the write_to_file command to write the information I obtained to a file within that directory
- Use this information to plan my route and prepare for my adventure
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am adequately prepared for the trip and not take unnecessary risks.
thoughts.speak: I have obtained the information I need about the Brno Reservoir Trail. I will use the execute_shell command to create a new directory for my trip and write the information I obtained to a file within that directory.

args.command_line:
mkdir brno_reservoir_trip
cd brno_reservoir_trip
echo "Distance: 5.4 miles
Duration: 2 hours and 14 minutes
Elevation gain: 285 feet" > brno_reservoir_trail_info.txt
